column1: Art Institute of Chicago////It has an amazing Van Gogh Poet's Garden
column2: which they keep moving and making it hard to find
column3: and a gorgeous interior garden with a neoclassical fountain that is especially cool when you're a small child and everything looks huge
column4: but nice even as an adult. Overlooking this is a gallery that includes a small
column6: pugnacious satyr from ancient Greece. I sent a phone photo of it to an artist friend
